description: Sum of odd divisors of n < sqrt(n) = sum of even divisors of n < sqrt(n).
comments: All terms except first one appear to be even. - _Michel Marcus_, Jul 15 2013
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = {so = 0; se = 0; fordiv (n, d, if (d < sqrt(n), if (d % 2, so += d, se += d))); return (so == se);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 14 2013
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_
